Class DateTimeInterval

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.rsa.mcc.DateTimeInterval

  • public class DateTimeInterval
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class to calculate a difference between two dates.

    1.0
    Author:
    Myzika Alex xcsportskier@gmail.com

    • Method Detail

      • between

        public static DateTimeInterval between(java.time.LocalDateTime from,
                                       java.time.LocalDateTime to)
        The method calculate a difference between from and to dates and expresses it in years, months, days, hours, minutes, seconds and milliseconds
        Parameters:
        from - a start date
        to - a finish date
        Returns:
        an object of DataTimeInterval. Use getters to retrieve certain portion of interval like years or hours.
        See Also:
        LocalDateTime
